CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local Type = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() local bAllOn = true if 0 == Type then UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) else UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(0) bAllOn = false end ChangeAllListChkBtn("SFRM_MYHOME_WRITE_VISIT_COMMENT", "LIST_MYHOME_BUFF_LIST", "CBTN_CHECK", bAllOn)

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf local Img = kSelf:GetControl("IMG_STATE") if not Img:IsNil() then Img:SetUVIndex(kSelf:GetBuildIndex() + 1) kSelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(201089 + kSelf:GetBuildIndex())) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf OnClickMinimapMyhomePopupItem(kSelf) kSelf:GetParent():GetParent():Close() return true
